These truths, as presented in Revelation 14, in connection with the \93everlasting gospel,\94 will distinguish the church of Christ at the time of his appearing. For as the result of the threefold message it is announced, \93Here are they that keep the commandments of God, and the faith of Jesus.\94 And this message is the last to be given before the coming 
454
of the Lord. Immediately following its proclamation, the Son of man is seen by the prophet, coming in glory to reap the harvest of the earth.
